org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions

Class AsyncTransaction<IMMUTABLE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions.ImmutableReference<IMMUTABLE>
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions.Transaction<IMMUTABLE>
        • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions.AsyncTransaction<IMMUTABLE>
  • Type Parameters:
    IMMUTABLE - The type of immutable data structure.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blade, IsolationBlade

    public abstract class AsyncTransaction<IMMUTABLE>
extends Transaction<IMMUTABLE>
    An asynchronous operation to be applied to an ImmutableReference. The new immutable reference resulting from the update should be stored in this.immutable.
